sourcesContent:
import { Component, ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { Prospecto } from '../../Classes/Prospecto'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './captura.component.html', }) export class CapturaComponent implements OnInit { prospectoModel = new Prospecto("", "", "", "", 0, "", 0, "", "", [], ""); exampleModel = new Prospecto("Lop", "Martin", "", "LOPS", 1000, "sojq", 80000, "6446644664", "1234567890123", [], ""); counter = 0; constructor() { } @ViewChild('documentos') d1!: ElementRef; ngOnInit() { this.prospectoModel.documentos[0] = { nombreDocumento: "hola" }; } agregarDoc() { this.d1.nativeElement.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', `

`); this.counter++; } onSubmit() { this.exampleModel = this.prospectoModel; } }
